name: Venus
pages: The stormy planet!$(br2)Venus can be found in space roughly south of the sun.$(br2)Natural resources: iron, redstone, lapis lazuli, sulfur, sulfur crystals.$(br)Mobs: Flare, Gust, Piglins, Hoglins, Voided Piglins, Skeletons, Sulfur Cubes

pages.text: Venusian bricks can be used to craft a portal to Venus, and then lit using a steel rod.$(br2)Note: Venus portals can only be used from the overworld to Venus.$(br2)This does mean you either need to be in creative mode or visit Venus for the first time using the spaceship!
